name: Soul Keeper (Marc Gálvez)
description:
Soul Keeper

Soul Keeper is a singelplayer action game where you are the DEATH, and need to kill and rape souls to keep your soul lantern alive. Your main goal is descend by the elevator to the hell, rapping as much as possible souls from the creatures that will appear you every floor.

CONTROLS:

Keyboard & Mouse:

  • "WASD" to move
  • "Space" to jump
  • "Shift" to dash
  • "Mouse" to aim
  • "Mouse RClick" to shot

Controller:

  • "WASD" to move
  • "Space" to jump
  • "Shift" to dash
  • "Mouse" to aim
  • "Mouse RClick" to shot

All the art and music/sfx are original and have been created by us!

A game made by:

Ivan Ropero (Programmer)

Oriol Capdevila (Programmer)

José Antonio Prieto (Programmer)

Dídac Llop (Programmer)

Víctor Segura (Programmer)

Marc Gálvez (Programmer)

Lluis Moreu (Voxel Artist)

Enric Pérez (Voxel Artist)

Pol Recasens (UI master)

Christian Martínez (Composer)
